summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5971 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 54, Terry's First Addition, being the alley between 7th Avenue and 8th Avenue from Madison Street to Marion Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 79792, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
